entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
